body:
**Keyword Categories** we fetch data for: ceo, executive staff, stock ticker, company name, products, subsidiaries.

This chart below details the article **distribution per keyword.**

For each company we put together a list of keywords, each keyword has a specific category as attribute which then enable us to aggregate data per category.

By clicking a keyword category, this updates the right hand side chart with the finer distribution per keyword used to fetch the news.

Looking at this chart you should be able to judge in which proportion each keyword plays a role in the overall ESG scores.
